articles.author: Daniel McDonnell
articles.title: Jack Byrne set for APOEL exit after just nine months - Independent.ie
articles.description: Jack Byrne could leave APOEL Nicosia before the close of the European transfer window next week, just nine months into his two-and-a-half-year contract.
articles.content:
Jack Byrne could leave APOEL Nicosia before the close of the European transfer window next week, just nine months into his two-and-a-half-year contract.
A short-term move to the UK is a possible opt… [+2118 chars]
